title: Leaving a Godly Legacy
itunes:author: Guest: Carey Casey
itunes:summary:
Whether you have kids or grandkids, the choices you make today will impact future generations. John and Danny discuss how fathers and grandfathers can stay legacy minded in the decisions you make now. Featuring Carey Casey.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive the book "Championship Grandfathering: How to Build a Winning Legacy" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-09-27?refcd=1488302


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/leaving-a-godly-legacy/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/being-a-champion-to-your-grandkids-digital-product/?refcd=1488302


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
